TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SessionSecurityToken extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken

Docs.summary: Defines a security token that contains data associated with a session.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 会话令牌存储<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal>与会话，以及定义会话; 其他参数相关联的用户例如会话开始和结束时间。
在被动的情况下，<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule>调入<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>(SAM) 创建的会话令牌身份验证管道从<xref:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal>表示经过身份验证的用户。 SAM 使用其配置<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>以创建令牌并将其序列化到 cookie （和进行反序列化中的后续请求的 cookie 的令牌）。 SAM 使用其配置是实例<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>类将写回到 HTTP 响应的 cookie。 此 cookie 然后返回到客户端，客户端可以在后续请求显示 cookie，而不是回要重新获取安全令牌的标识提供程序进行的往返过程。 有关会话使用 WIF 的运作方式的详细信息，请参阅[WIF 会话管理](~/docs/framework/security/wif-session-management.md)。 有关在 Web 场方案中使用会话的信息，请参阅[WIF 和 Web 场](~/docs/framework/security/wif-and-web-farms.md)。
会话令牌可以在任何一种引用模式运行，或不。 如果有会话令牌未运行在引用模式下，整个令牌序列化到存储在客户端的会话 cookie。 序列化的会话令牌可能会很大，因此客户端上存储的 cookie 也可以是相当相当大。 在引用模式下，而不是序列化整个会话 cookie 到令牌，该令牌存储在会话安全令牌缓存并仅用于生成密钥从缓存中检索令牌所需的信息存储在 cookie 中。 这可以极大地降低的 cookie 的大小。 由派生自类实现会话令牌缓存<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCache>并由实现缓存键<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCacheKey>类。 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ContextId%2A>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyGeneration%2A>属性用在<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCacheKey>类生成的缓存密钥。
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A>属性确定是否会话令牌是否已在引用模式下。
> [!IMPORTANT] > 若要在引用模式下操作提供的处理程序的 Microsoft 建议<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated?displayProperty=nameWithType>global.asax.cs 文件和设置中的事件<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A>令牌上的属性中传递<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。 这将确保会话令牌在为每个请求的引用模式下运行，并且通过仅设置偏好<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>会话身份验证模块上的属性。
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>提供使用 WIF 类序列化作为 Ws-secure Conversation 会话令牌`<wsc:SecurityContextToken>`元素。

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal claimsPrincipal) cil managed

Docs.param: The claims principal from which to initialize the token.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified principal.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表显示了 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> 类的某个实例的初始属性值。
|属性|初始值| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ClaimsPrincipal%2A>|`claimsPrincipal`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Context%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ContextId%2A>|设置为生成的唯一 id。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.EndpointId%2A>|<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Id%2A>|设置为生成的唯一 id。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsPersistent%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyEffectiveTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyExpirationTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A> 加上<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultTokenLifetime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyGeneration%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.SecurityKeys%2A>|包含生成的 128 位对称密钥。 **注意：** 默认实现不使用此属性。 通过应用 cookie 转换规定签名和加密密钥<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>处理该令牌。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ValidTo%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A> 加上<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultTokenLifetime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。|

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表显示了 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> 类的某个实例的初始属性值。
|属性|初始值| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ClaimsPrincipal%2A>|`claimsPrincipal`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Context%2A>|`context`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ContextId%2A>|设置为生成的唯一 id。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.EndpointId%2A>|<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Id%2A>|设置为生成的唯一 id。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsPersistent%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyEffectiveTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyExpirationTime%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A> 加上<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultTokenLifetime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyGeneration%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.SecurityKeys%2A>|包含生成的 128 位对称密钥。 **注意：** 默认实现不使用此属性。 通过应用 cookie 转换规定签名和加密密钥<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>处理该令牌。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ValidTo%2A>|<xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A> 加上<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultTokenLifetime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal claimsPrincipal, valuetype System.TimeSpan lifetime) cil managed

Docs.param: The claims principal from which to initialize the token.
The period from the current time during which the token is valid. The property will be set to and the property will be set to plus the period specified by this parameter.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified principal. The new token is valid from through the specified lifetime.

The time instant at which the token becomes valid. to specify
The time instant after which the token is no longer valid. to specify that the value should be determined by adding the value of the property to the time specified by the validFrom parameter.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表显示了 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> 类的某个实例的初始属性值。
|属性|初始值| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ClaimsPrincipal%2A>|`claimsPrincipal`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Context%2A>|`context`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ContextId%2A>|设置为生成的唯一 id。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.EndpointId%2A>|<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Id%2A>|设置为生成的唯一 id。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsPersistent%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyEffectiveTime%2A>|设置的值为<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A>属性所确定的那样`ValidFrom`参数。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyExpirationTime%2A>|值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ValidTo%2A>属性所确定的那样`ValidTo`参数。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyGeneration%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.SecurityKeys%2A>|包含生成的 128 位对称密钥。 **注意：** 默认实现不使用此属性。 通过应用 cookie 转换规定签名和加密密钥<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>处理该令牌。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A>|值`validFrom`参数，或者，如果`validFrom`是`null`， <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ValidTo%2A>|`validFrom` 参数的值。 如果`validFrom`是`null`的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A>属性 (由`validFrom`参数) 以及<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultTokenLifetime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。|

public: SessionSecurityToken(System::Security::Claims::ClaimsPrincipal ^ claimsPrincipal, System::String ^ context, System::String ^ endpointId, Nullable<DateTime> validFrom, Nullable<DateTime> validTo);

new System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken : System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal * string * string * Nullable<DateTime> * Nullable<DateTime> -> System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken

Docs.param: The claims principal that was generated from the bootstrap token.
An optional, application-specific context string.
The endpoint to which this token is bound. An empty string creates an unscoped token.
The time instant at which the token becomes valid. to specify .
The time instant after which the token is no longer valid. to specify that the value should be determined by adding the value of the property to the time specified by the validFrom parameter.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified principal and bootstrap token; and with the specified start time and expiration time. The new token is scoped to the specified endpoint.

The context identifier associated with this token.
An optional, application-specific context string.
The endpoint to which this token is bound. An empty string creates an unscoped token.

An optional symmetric session key.

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal claimsPrincipal, class System.Xml.UniqueId contextId, string context, string endpointId, valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype System.DateTime> validFrom, valuetype System.Nullable`1<valuetype System.DateTime> validTo, class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricSecurityKey key) cil managed

public: SessionSecurityToken(System::Security::Claims::ClaimsPrincipal ^ claimsPrincipal, System::Xml::UniqueId ^ contextId, System::String ^ context, System::String ^ endpointId, Nullable<DateTime> validFrom, Nullable<DateTime> validTo, System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SymmetricSecurityKey ^ key);

new System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken : System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal * System.Xml.UniqueId * string * string * Nullable<DateTime> * Nullable<DateTime> * System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricSecurityKey -> System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken
MemberSignature.Usage: new System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken (claimsPrincipal, contextId, context, endpointId, validFrom, validTo, key)

Docs.param: The claims principal that is associated with this session.
The context identifier associated with this token.
An optional, application-specific context string.
The endpoint to which this token is bound. An empty string creates an unscoped token.
The time instant at which the token becomes valid. to specify
The time instant after which the token is no longer valid. to specify that the value should be determined by adding the value of the property to the time specified by the validFrom parameter.
An optional symmetric session key.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified principal, context ID, context, endpoint, start time, expiration time, and key.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表显示了 <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> 类的某个实例的初始属性值。
|属性|初始值| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ClaimsPrincipal%2A>|`claimsPrincipal`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Context%2A>|`context`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ContextId%2A>|`contextId`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.EndpointId%2A>|`endpointId`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.Id%2A>|设置为生成的唯一 id。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsPersistent%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyEffectiveTime%2A>|设置的值为<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A>属性所确定的那样`ValidFrom`参数。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyExpirationTime%2A>|值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ValidTo%2A>属性所确定的那样`ValidTo`参数。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyGeneration%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.SecurityKeys%2A>|包含单个元素，可以是`key`或者，如果`key`是`null`，生成的 128 位对称密钥。 **注意：** 默认实现不使用此属性。 通过应用 cookie 转换规定签名和加密密钥<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>处理该令牌。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A>|值`validFrom`参数，或者，如果`validFrom`是`null`， <xref:System.DateTime.UtcNow%2A>。| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ValidTo%2A>|`validFrom` 参数的值。 如果`validFrom`是`null`的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ValidFrom%2A>属性 (由`validFrom`参数) 以及<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.DefaultTokenLifetime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。|

Docs.exception: is . -or- The property of is . -or- is .
is greater than or equal to . -or- is less than the current time.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClaimsPrincipal As ClaimsPrincipal
public: property System::Security::Claims::ClaimsPrincipal ^ ClaimsPrincipal { System::Security::Claims::ClaimsPrincipal ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the claims principal associated with the session.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Context As String
public: property System::String ^ Context { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a user specified context value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于存储应用程序特定的上下文。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContextId As UniqueId
public: property System::Xml::UniqueId ^ ContextId { System::Xml::UniqueId ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the session context identifier

remarks.format:
## Remarks 跨所有会话令牌，上下文标识符是唯一的。
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCacheKey>类都使用的上下文 ID 和密钥的生成来生成中的令牌的密钥<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCache>。
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>类将为此属性序列化为`<Identifier>`的子元素`<wsc:SecurityContextToken>`元素。 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EndpointId As String
public: property System::String ^ EndpointId { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the ID of the endpoint to which this token is scoped.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!IMPORTANT] > 如果<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.EndpointId%2A>属性是`null`、 会话令牌被处理为全局划分作用域由<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>类。 这会给潜在的安全风险。

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void GetObjectData (System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetObjectData(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed

abstract member GetObjectData : System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo * System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext -> unit override this.GetObjectData : System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo * System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext -> unit

Docs.param: The serialized object data.
The contextual information about the source or destination.
Docs.summary: Sets the with information necessary to serialize the session security token.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Id As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Id { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the unique identifier of this token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>类将为此属性序列化为`Id`属性`<wsc:SecurityContextToken>`元素。 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsPersistent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsPersistent : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cookie represented by this token is persistent.
Docs.value: 如果 cookie 是持久的;否则为。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsPersistent%2A>属性是`true`，cookie 被编写为持久性 cookie。 浏览器关闭之前在过期后，永久 cookie 保持有效。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsReferenceMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsReferenceMode : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the session security token is operating in reference mode.
Docs.value: 如果会话模式，则在运行，该令牌否则为。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在引用模式下，在序列化过程中生成一个简单的项目和与令牌处理程序关联的令牌缓存中存储令牌的材料。 令牌缓存是派生自的类的实例<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCache>。 对于 Web 场方案中，令牌缓存必须运行跨场中的所有节点。
> [!IMPORTANT] > 若要在引用模式下操作提供的处理程序的 Microsoft 建议<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated?displayProperty=nameWithType>global.asax.cs 文件和设置中的事件<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A>令牌上的属性中传递<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。 这将确保会话令牌在为每个请求的引用模式下运行，并且通过仅设置偏好<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>会话身份验证模块上的属性。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyEffectiveTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime KeyEffectiveTime { DateTime get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the time instant from which the key in this token is valid.
Docs.value: 从其即时的时间的关键是有效的。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyExpirationTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime KeyExpirationTime { DateTime get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the time instant after which the key in this token is no longer valid.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeyGeneration As UniqueId
public: property System::Xml::UniqueId ^ KeyGeneration { System::Xml::UniqueId ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the identifier for the key generation in this token
Docs.value: 密钥生成此令牌中唯一标识符。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.KeyGeneration%2A>属性内是唯一的会话令牌。 会话令牌颁发时具有仅上下文 ID，它是可通过访问<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ContextId%2A>属性。 续订的会话令牌时，将添加密钥生成。
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCacheKey>类都使用的上下文 ID 和密钥的生成来生成中的令牌的密钥<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCache>。
<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>类将为此属性序列化为`<Instance>`的子元素`<wsc:SecurityContextToken>`元素。 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.WriteToken%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SecureConversationVersion As Uri
public: property Uri ^ SecureConversationVersion { Uri ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a URI that identifies the version of WS-Secure Conversation that is used to serialize this session security token.
Docs.value: 标识用于序列化此令牌的 Ws-secure Conversation 的版本的 URI。

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>基类支持 Ws-secure Conversation Feb2005 和 Ws-secure Conversation 1.3。 对于这些版本的 Ws-secure Conversation Uri 是否"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/02/sc"和"http://docs.oasis-open.org/ws-sx/ws-secureconversation/200512"分别。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property SecurityKeys As ReadOnlyCollection(Of SecurityKey)

Docs.summary: Gets the keys associated with this session. This is usually a single key.
Docs.value: 与会话相关联的密钥。 通常是一个密钥。

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > 默认实现不使用此属性。 通过应用 cookie 转换规定签名和加密密钥<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler>处理该令牌。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ValidFrom As DateTime
public: virtual property DateTime ValidFrom { DateTime get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the time instant from which the token is valid.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ValidTo As DateTime
public: virtual property DateTime ValidTo { DateTime get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the time instant after which the token is no longer valid.
Docs.value: 此后令牌将不再有效的时间。
